content: To briefly recap the past quarter on Slide 2, first we continue to strengthen our financial foundation in Q4 by maintaining a high level of investment credit quality, with over 98% of our loan investments, retaining our highest credit rating at quarter end, up from 95% last quarter, generating a return on equity of 13.9% on a trailing 12-month basis, and registering a gross unlevered IRR of 12.2% on our total unrealized portfolio, with our current fair value 3% above the total cost of our portfolio, and a gross unlevered IRR of 16.4% on total realizations of $764 million.
